Pre-Game Insights: Rohit Sharma and Rahul Dravid address the Indian squad during their training session

India take on their neighbours Afghanistan, a team that has grown from strength to strength in the past few years and pose some good threat to the 'Men in Blue' as far as their bowling department is concerned
The Indian batters have played the Afghanistan players often in the IPL and might read them well
With the Caribbean tracks favouring the spinners, India need to be at the top of their game to counter the Afghan challenge
Others: The Board of Control for Cricket in India (BCCI) posted a video on their social media handle which showcases the Indian team slowly getting into the groove and sweating it out in the training nets before they start their Super 8 round

What grabbed eyeballs was the sight of Rinku Singh rolling his arm over in the Team India nets. The explosive Kolkata Knight Riders batsman is a travelling reserve in the squad and is waiting for his chance to come by in the ongoing World Cup
India play Afghanistan in their first Super 8 round match
